Major  O
Project:  O
Project  O
Name  O
:  O
Gesture  O
Control  O
ROBOT  O
Language  O
of  O
implementation:  O
Embedded  O
C  O
programming..  O
Description:  O
A  O
gesture  O
control  O
robot  O
is  O
a  O
kind  O
of  O
robot  O
which  O
can  O
be  O
controlled  O
by  O
your  O
hand  O
not  O
by  O
old  O
buttons..  O
it  O
is  O
operating  O
by  O
transmitting  O
device  O
from  O
your  O
hand  O
which  O
included  O
an  O
acceleration  O
meter..  O
At  O
the  O
receiving  O
end  O
an  O
RF  O
receiver  O
module  O
receive  O
and  O
decode  O

existing  O

to  O
traditional  O

ANDROID  O
The  O
online  O
voting  O
system  O
application  O
is  O
the  O
system  O
that  O
aims  O
in  O
reducing  O
the  O
complexity  O
and  O
cost  O
of  O
the  O
election  O
process..  O
Here  O
the  O
voter  O
can  O
vote  O
in  O
spite  O
of  O
his  O
absence  O
in  O
the  O
particular  O
locality..  O
Thus  O
the  O
online  O
voting  O
system  O
can  O
reduce  O
the  O
cost  O
and  O
effort  O
of  O
election  O
process  O
..In  O
this  O
voting  O
system  O
application  O

voter  O
will  O
be  O
provided  O
with  O
a  O
specic  O

through  O

can  O
be  O

system  O

the  O
next  O

EZTax  O
Tax  O
Filing  O
Application:  O
Description:  O
EZTax  O
is  O
most  O
comprehensive,  O
innovative,  O
advanced  O
tax  O
engine  O
in  O
India  O
for  O
tax  O
filing  O
through  O
online  O
it  O
directly  O
connect  O
to  O
ITD  O
site  O
of  O
tax  O
department..  O
This  O
application  O
allows  O
the  O
users  O
to  O
file  O
their  O
taxes..  O
Eztax  O
serving  O
3  O
types  O
of  O
services  O
for  O
filing  O
income  O
tax..  O
1..SELF  O
SERVICE:  O
In  O
this  O
service  O
a  O
client  O
can  O
select  O
related  O
income  O
heads  O
from  O
tax-profile  O
and  O
if  O
client  O
have  O

income  O
head,  O
upload  O
form-16  O
or  O
else  O
fill  O
manually,  O
for  O
every  O
field  O
EZTax  O
provide  O
help  O
blocks  O
to  O
know  O
the  O
information  O
about  O
fields,  O
EZTax  O
analyze  O
the  O
data  O

and  O
give  O
suggestions  O
to  O
decrease  O
taxation  O
through  O
tax  O
optimizer  O
to  O
next  O
assessment  O
year..  O

to  O
avoid  O
the  O
notices  O
from  O
Income  O
tax  O
department..  O
2..  O

Project  O
Description:  O

is  O
used  O
to  O
identify  O

frauds  O
in  O

to  O

the  O

leakage  O
of  O
the  O
company..  O

are  O
two  O
types  O
of  O
data  O
come  O
from  O
the  O
client  O

first  O
one  O
is  O
mobility(voice)  O
and  O
the  O
second  O
one  O
is  O
tele-media(landline)..For  O
each  O
data,  O
there  O
are  O
several  O
types  O
of  O
files,  O
For  O
mobility-  O
voice(cdr)  O
,Gprs,  O
Tapin,  O
NRTRDE  O
and  O
for  O
Tele-media  O

voice  O
,Gprs,  O
NGN..  O

files  O
are  O
coming  O
from  O
different  O
teams..  O

of  O
the  O

is  O
to  O
check  O

generation  O
is  O

not  O

to  O
the  O
thresholds.  O

Project  O
Work  O
Management  O
System  O
(  O
January  DATE
2015  DATE
to  O
March  DATE
2015)  DATE
Worked  O
on  O
this  O
project  O
under  O
the  O
guidance  O
of  O
an  O
IIT  O
alumni..  O
It  O
is  O
a  O
system  O
to  O
manage  O
work..  O
The  O
project  O
helps  O
in  O
managing  O
everyday  O
team-work  O
for  O
teams  O
of  O
different  O
sizes  O
but  O
same  O
team  O
hierarchy..  O
The  O
Application  O
is  O
a  O
single  O
page  O
application  O
means  O
that  O
the  O
rendering  O
on  O
client  O
browser  O
is  O
done  O
only  O
once,  O
for  O
every  O
subsequent  O
interaction  O
the  O
communication  O
with  O
server  O
is  O
done  O
via  O
ajax  O
calls..  O
The  O
main  O
objectives  O
of  O
the  O
system  O
were  O
:  O
1)  O
Reduced  O
operational  O
time  O
2)  O
Increased  O
accuracy  O
and  O
reliability..  O
3)  O
Increased  O
operational  O
efficiency..  O
4)  O
Data  O
security.  O

and  O
Environments  O

:  O

Project  O
title:  O
HUMIDITY  O
SENSING  O
USING  O
MICRROCONTRROLLER  O

College  O
Project  O
Team  O
Size:  O
4  O
members.  O

Project  O
Description:  O
The  O
aim  O
of  O
this  O
project  O
is  O
to  O
use  O
control  O
engineering  O
principles  O
and  O
concepts  O
to  O
provide  O
a  O
microcontroller  O
based  O
soil  O
moisture  O
sensing  O
system  O
In  O
crop  O
production  O
a  O
healthy  O
water  O
balance  O
is  O
essential  O
for  O
high  O
quality  O
yields..  O
Under-watered  O
crops  O
suffer  O
from  O
nutrient  O
deficiencies  O
while  O
over-watered  O
plants  O
are  O
more  O
susceptible  O
to  O
diseases  O
pressure  O
and  O
can  O
in  O
some  O
cases  O
lead  O
to  O
root  O
death  O
through  O
suffocation..  O
The  O
system  O
will  O
help  O
in  O
saving  O
money  O
and  O
water  O
and  O
at  O
the  O
same  O
time  O
increasing  O
crops  O
production..  O
The  O
automated  O
irrigation  O
system  O
is  O
controlled  O
using  O
ATmega16  O
micro  O
controller..  O
The  O
system  O
is  O
programmed  O
via  O
the  O
microcontroller  O
to  O
give  O
interrupt  O
signal  O
to  O
the  O
sensing  O
system  O
(sensor,  O
GSM  O
etc..)  O
depending  O
on  O
the  O
soil  O
moisture  O
levels..  O
The  O
soil  O
moisture/humidity  O
levels  O
are  O
checked  O
using  O
soil  O
moisture  O
sensor  O
Whenever  O
there  O
is  O
a  O
change  O
in  O
moisture/humidity  O
in  O
the  O
soil  O
this  O
sensor  O
senses  O
the  O
change  O
and  O
gives  O
an  O
interrupt  O
signal  O
to  O
the  O
micro-controller  O
and  O
thus  O
the  O
GSM  O
system  O
is  O
activated  O
or  O
deactivated.  O

results..  O

Project::  O
-  O
In  O
this  O
project,  O
a  O
web  O
application  O
was  O
designed  O
for  O
the  O

students  O
can  O

their  O
resumes  O
in  O
a  O
standard  O
format  O

simply  O
entering  O
their  O
information  O
in  O
a  O
web  O
form.  O
It  O
is  O
also  O
an  O
information  O
exchange  O
platform  O
between  O
the  O
companies  O
visiting  O
our  O
college  O
for  O
placements  O
and  O
students  O
looking  O
for  O
job  O
opportunities.  O

students  O
can  O
visualize  O
the  O
details  O
of  O
upcoming  O
hiring  O
companies  O
and  O
the  O

can  O
filter  O

Automatic  O
photo  O
enhancement  O
is  O
one  O
of  O
the  O
long-standing  O
goals  O
in  O
image  O
processing  O
and  O
computational  O
photography..  O
While  O
a  O
variety  O
of  O
methods  O
operate  O
on  O
the  O
entire  O
image  O
without  O
attempting  O
to  O
take  O
the  O
content  O
of  O
the  O
image  O
into  O
account  O
so  O
we  O
present  O
a  O
new  O
framework  O
for  O
automatic  O
photo  O
enhancement  O
that  O
attempts  O
to  O
take  O
local  O
and  O
global  O
image  O
semantics  O
into  O
account..  O
Specically,  O
our  O
content-aware  O
scheme  O
attempts  O
to  O
detect  O
and  O
enhance  O
the  O
appearance  O
of  O
human  O
faces,  O
blue  O
skies  O
with  O
or  O
without  O
clouds  O
and  O
underexposed  O
salient  O
regions.  O

Under  O
the  O
guidance  O
of  O
Dr..  O
Ferdous  O
Ahmed  O
Barbhuiya,  O
IIIT  ORG
Guwahati..  ORG
January  DATE
2017April  DATE
2017  DATE

Projects  O
IASFF  O
(Intelligent  O
Agricultural  O
System  O
For  O
Farmers)  O
IASFF  O
is  O
a  O
system  O
which  O
monitors  O
amount  O
of  O
nitrogen,  O
oxygen,  O
humidity  O
and  O
many  O
other  O
factors  O
over  O
a  O
period  O
of  O
time  O
and  O
sends  O
real  O
time  O
data  O
update  O
to  O
the  O
server  O
where  O
it  O
is  O
stored  O
and  O
a  O
plot  O
is  O
created  O
in  O
real  O
time  O
from  O
the  O
data  O
for  O
better  O
visibility  O
and  O
analysis..  O
Farmers  O
can  O
also  O
control  O
their  O
motors  O
via  O
mobile  O
..Thus  O
eliminating  O
their  O
need  O
to  O
be  O
present  O
in  O
fields  O
all  O
the  O
time  O
..  O

and  O
IOT  O
are  O
used  O
in  O
this  O
project.  O

ennd-to-ennd  O
Enncryption  O

PROJECTS  O
ZappRx  O
Project  O
Details:  O
ZappRx  O
is  O
an  O
application  O
for  O
prescription  O
management  O
that  O
allows  O
healthcare  O
providers,  O
patients,  O
and  O
pharmacists  O
to  O
more  O
easily  O
interact  O
and  O
communicate.  O
When  O
a  O
provider  O
writes  O
an  O
e-prescription  O
using  O
ZappRx,  O
the  O
patient  O
instantly  O
receives  O
the  O
prescription  O
on  O
their  O
smartphone  O
and  O
can  O
easily  O
ll,  O
transfer,  O

or  O
renew  O
it.  O
ZappRx  O
provides  O
a  O
secure  O
collaborative  O
online  O
platform  O
that  O
allows  O
patients,  O
physicians  O
and  O
pharmacists  O
to  O
work  O
together  O
to  O
improve  O
patients  O
access  O
to  O
treatment,  O
delivering  O
medicine  O
faster,  O
with  O
fewer  O
hassles  O
and  O
greater  O
transparency.  O

PROJECTS  O
Road  O
Crack  O
Detection  O
Based  O
ON  O
Image  O
Processing  O
(using  O
MATLAB)  O

road  O
crack  O
recognition  O
software  O
with  O

The  O
project  O
introduces  O
the  O
process  O
of  O
image  O
processing  O
and  O
recognition  O
in  O
detail.  O

Successfully  O

a  O

road  O
crack  O
feature  O
of  O
image  O
by  O
using  O
threshold  O
segmentation  O
and  O
edge  O
detection  O
technology.  O

Single  O
resistance-controlled  O
quadrature  O
oscillator  O
and  O
filter  O
(using  O
PSPICE)  O
Designed  O
a  O
single  O
resistance-controlled  O
oscillator  O
and  O
filter  O
with  O
the  O
help  O
of  O
the  O
CFOA  O
.  O

Reduced  O
number  O
of  O
passive  O
elements  O
using  O
only  O
two  O
Current-Feedback  O
Operational  O
Amplifiers  O
(Cfoas).  O

The  O
Circuit  O
Has  O
the  O
Advantage  O
of  O
Independent  O
Control  O
of  O
The  O
Condition  O
of  O
Oscillation  O
and  O
The  O
Oscillation  O
Frequency  O
Through  O
A  O
Single  O
Resistor  O

Cable  O

Detection  O
(using  O

system  O
to  O
detect  O
underground  O
cable  O
fault  O

change  O

the  O
fault.  O

PROJECT  O
TITLE:  O

Bounded  O
Anytime  O
Heuristic  O
Search  O
A*  O
Algorithm  O
This  O
Project  O
presents  O
a  O
heuristic-search  O
algorithm  O
called  O
Memory-bounded  O
Anytime  O
Window  O
A*(MAWA*),  O
which  O
is  O
complete,  O
anytime,  O
and  O
memory  O
bounded.  O
MAWA*  O
uses  O
the  O
window-  O
bounded  O
anytime-search  O
methodology  O
of  O
AWA*  O
as  O
the  O
basic  O
framework  O
and  O
combines  O
it  O
with  O
the  O
memory-bounded  O
A*  O
-like  O
approach  O
to  O
handle  O
restricted  O
memory  O

situations.  O

and  O
efficient  O
versions  O
of  O
MAWA*  O
targeted  O
for  O
tree  O
search  O
have  O

Project  O
Abstract:  O
https://www.indeed.com/r/Yogi-Pesaru/2ed7aded59ecf425  O
isid=rex-download&ikw=download-top&co=IN  O
The  O
integration  O
for  O
Sterling  O
is  O
a  O
two-way  O
integration  O
to  O
support  O
the  O
investigation  O
and  O
confirm  O
accuracy  O
of  O
background  O
information  O
provided  O
by  O
selected  O
candidates  O
who  O
have  O
received  O
have  O
passed  O
phone  O
screening  O
&  O
or  O
accepted  O
verbal  O
offers  O
of  O
employment.  O

Boomi  O
is  O
the  O
middle  O
ware  O
between  O
success  O
factor  O
and  O
sterling  O
systems.  O
Boomi  O
sender  O
interface  O
picks  O
up  O
the  O
profiles  O
from  O
SF  O
and  O
send  O
to  O
sterling  O
for  O
background  O
verification.  O
After  O
receiving  O
request  O
from  O
boomi  O
sterling  O
will  O
send  O
synchronous  O
response  O
with  O
an  O
Oder  O
number,  O
which  O
will  O
be  O
updated  O
to  O
SF  O
synchronously.  O
After  O
some  O
time  O
boomi  O
receiver  O

process  O
(listener  O
process)  O
receives  O
the  O
asynchronous  O
results  O
from  O
sterling  O
which  O
are  O
updated  O
back  O
to  O
SF.  O

Role  O
and  O
responsibilities:  O
Requirement  O
analysis.  O
Design  O
as  O
per  O
the  O
requirement.  O
Process  O
development  O
as  O
per  O
design.  O
Unit  O
testing  O
the  O
applications.  O

BTRAMR0001SYSER.rptdesign  O
(Work  O
order  O
report):  O
My  O
client  O
was  O
using  O
default  O
BTRAMR2  O
Work  O
order  O
reports.  O
They  O
also  O
use  O
a  O
different  O
work  O
order  O
report  O
in  O
Maximo  O
V4  O
and  O
V6.  O
The  O
earlier  O
used  O
report  O
have  O
many  O
drawbacks  O
such  O
as  O

No  O
Flexibility  O
for  O
modification  O
since  O
it  O
is  O
used  O
by  O
many  O
divisions  O
Empty  O
boxes,  O
lot  O
of  O
missing  O
information  O
Not  O
align  O
with  O
Systems  O
objectives  O
and  O
processes  O
Historical  O
context  O
on  O
the  O
asset  O
is  O
missing  O
Esthetical  O
issues:  O
Font  O
too  O
small,  O
input  O
fields  O
not  O
instinctive  O
No  O
bar  O
coding  O
used  O
The  O
outcome  O
of  O
this  O
report  O
is  O
a  O
form  O
to  O
support  O
technician's  O
work  O
and  O
regulation  O
and  O

give  O
them  O
simplicity  O
to  O
input  O
information.  O
It  O
covers  O
the  O
full  O
spectra  O
of  O
requirements  O
of  O
System  O
Services  O
divisions.  O
This  O
report  O
is  O
site  O
specific  O
one  O
and  O
it  O
will  O
display  O
the  O
WO  O
details  O
along  O
with  O
its  O
task  O
WOs  O
and  O
failure  O
reporting  O
information.  O
Each  O
site  O
is  O
having  O
their  O
own  O
logo.  O
This  O
current  O
report  O
will  O
display  O
the  O
logo  O
based  O
on  O

site.  O
It  O
was  O
implemented  O
in  O
V7.1  O
only.  O
In  O
V7.1  O
we  O
do  O
not  O
have  O
the  O
option  O
of  O
auto  O
resetting  O
page  O

WO  O

will  O
not  O
be  O
reset  O

.  O
I  O
have  O
implemented  O
this  O
option  O
in  O
this  O
report.  O

was  O
used  O
for  O
this  O
report  O
in  O
German  O
and  O

French  O

BTRAMR0009.rptdesign  O
(Availability  O
Report):  O

particular  O
report  O

to  O

of  O

Train  O

timeframe  O

selected  O
work  O
types  O

work  O
order  O
parameters.  O
Availability  O
can  O
be  O
calculated  O
based  O
on  O
a  O
Fleet  O
or  O
a  O
single  O
Train.  O

to  O

to  O

this  O
base  O
as  O

BTRAMR0027.rptdesign  O
(Card  O
Stock  O
Report):  O
Existing  O
report  O
functionality:  O
Technician  O
requiring  O
a  O
part  O
will  O
take  O
the  O
component  O
in  O
its  O
bin  O
along  O
with  O
an  O
Inventory  O
Card.  O
The  O
technician  O
reports  O
the  O
consumption  O
at  O
the  O
exit  O
of  O
the  O
storeroom  O
on  O
the  O
Kiosk  O
computer  O
where  O
he  O
scans  O
its  O
Work  O
Order  O
and  O
the  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
in  O
the  O
application  O
Issue  O
and  O
Transfer  O
of  O

Maximo.  O
When  O
we  O
rebuild  O
something  O
internally,  O
the  O
technician  O
will  O
bring  O
the  O
new  O
assembly  O
in  O
store,  O
grab  O
the  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
and  O
he  O
will  O
report  O
the  O
return  O
in  O
store  O
against  O
the  O
rebuilt  O
Work  O
order.  O
Objectives:  O
Created  O
a  O
card  O
stock  O
report  O
in  O
order  O
to  O
match  O
the  O
existing  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
tool  O
developed  O
by  O
Systems.  O
Increase  O
reporting  O
of  O

consumption  O
Redefine  O
the  O
process  O
of  O
cycle  O
count  O
(80%  O
efficiency  O
in  O
Systems)  O
The  O
report  O
will  O
be  O
based  O
on  O
inventory  O
information  O
and  O
will  O
introduce  O
the  O
notion  O
of  O
real  O
time  O
to  O
increase  O
precision  O

2)  O

Description:  O
Online  O
Mobile  O
Recharge  O
is  O

we  O
record  O
the  O
detail  O
of  O
the  O
Recharges  O

the  O

is  O

process  O
for  O
the  O
users.  O

default  O

of  O

website  O
are  O
disabled.  O

to  O

user  O

and  O

PROJECT  O
TITLE:  O
Memory  O
Bounded  O
Anytime  O
Heuristic  O
Search  O
A*  O
Algorithm  O
This  O
Project  O
presents  O
a  O
heuristic-search  O
algorithm  O
called  O
Memory-bounded  O
Anytime  O
Window  O
A*(MAWA*),  O
which  O
is  O
complete,  O
anytime,  O
and  O
memory  O
bounded.  O
MAWA*  O
uses  O
the  O
window-  O
bounded  O
anytime-search  O
methodology  O
of  O
AWA*  O
as  O
the  O
basic  O
framework  O
and  O
combines  O
it  O
with  O
the  O
memory-bounded  O
A*  O
-like  O
approach  O
to  O
handle  O
restricted  O
memory  O

situations.  O

and  O
efficient  O
versions  O
of  O
MAWA*  O
targeted  O
for  O
tree  O
search  O
have  O
also  O
been  O
presented.  O
Experimental  O
results  O
of  O

problem  O

PROJECT  O
TITLE:  O
Memory  O
Bounded  O
Anytime  O
Heuristic  O
Search  O
A*  O
Algorithm  O

This  O
Project  O
presents  O
a  O
heuristic-search  O
algorithm  O
called  O
Memory-bounded  O
Anytime  O
Window  O
A*  O
(MAWA*),  O
which  O
is  O
complete,  O
anytime,  O
and  O
memory  O
bounded.  O
MAWA*  O
uses  O
the  O
window-bounded  O
anytime-search  O
methodology  O
of  O
AWA*  O
as  O
the  O
basic  O
framework  O
and  O
combines  O
it  O
with  O
the  O
memory-  O
bounded  O
A*  O
-like  O
approach  O
to  O
handle  O
restricted  O
memory  O
situations.  O
Simple  O
and  O
efficient  O
versions  O
of  O
MAWA*  O
targeted  O
for  O
tree  O
search  O
have  O
also  O
been  O

presented.  O
Experimental  O
results  O
of  O
the  O
sliding-tile  O
puzzle  O
problem  O
and  O
the  O
traveling-salesman  O
problem  O
show  O
the  O
significant  O
advantages  O
of  O
the  O
proposed  O
algorithm  O
over  O
existing  O
methods.  O

BTRAMR0027.rptdesign  O
(Card  O
Stock  O
Report):  O
Existing  O
report  O
functionality:  O
Technician  O
requiring  O
a  O
part  O
will  O
take  O
the  O
component  O
in  O
its  O
bin  O
along  O
with  O
an  O
Inventory  O
Card.  O
The  O
technician  O
reports  O
the  O
consumption  O
at  O
the  O
exit  O
of  O
the  O
storeroom  O
on  O
the  O
Kiosk  O
computer  O
where  O
he  O
scans  O
its  O
Work  O
Order  O
and  O
the  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
in  O
the  O
application  O
Issue  O
and  O
Transfer  O
of  O

Maximo.  O
When  O
we  O
rebuild  O
something  O
internally,  O
the  O
technician  O
will  O
bring  O
the  O
new  O
assembly  O
in  O
store,  O
grab  O
the  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
and  O
he  O
will  O
report  O
the  O
return  O
in  O
store  O
against  O
the  O
rebuilt  O
Work  O
order.  O
Objectives:  O
Created  O
a  O
card  O
stock  O
report  O
in  O
order  O
to  O
match  O
the  O
existing  O
Inventory  O
Card  O
tool  O
developed  O
by  O
Systems.  O
Increase  O
reporting  O
of  O

consumption  O
Redefine  O
the  O
process  O
of  O
cycle  O
count  O
(80%  O
efficiency  O
in  O
Systems)  O
The  O
report  O
will  O
be  O
based  O
on  O
inventory  O
information  O
and  O
will  O
introduce  O
the  O
notion  O
of  O
real  O
time  O
to  O
increase  O
precision  O

2)  O
CCB  O

component  O

change  O
